comments.author: arai.unmht@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
for https://github.com/mozilla-spidermonkey/jsparagus/pull/482

the patch will use universal pattern, instead of specific pattern, given that `ScopeData` is going to change some more time, and I'd like to keep m-c unaffected for subsequent changes, until all the related part gets ready in jsparagus side.
